name: Full Moon (SuperZikoure)
description:
You need to escape from a monster while being in the dark. To do so, you will need to reach and unlock the gate at the end of the level.
Some of the doors will be locked, you will need to find the correct keys to open them.
You can generate noise to navigate in your environment better, but the monster will also be drawn to the noise.
You can escape from it by hiding into closets and waiting for it to leave.

Controls :
- Directional Keys : Move.
- Spacebar : Interact with objects, stairs, ladders and doors.
- Shift : Scream.
